paper_abstract: We compare the expressive power of process calculi by studying the problem of electing a leader in a symmetric network of processes. We consider the pi-calculus with mixed choice, separate choice and internal mobility, value-passing CCS and Mobile Ambients, together with other ambient calculi (Safe Ambients, the Push and Pull Ambient Calculus and Boxed Ambients). We provide a unified approach for all these calculi using reduction semantics. (C) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Tutorial on separation results in process calculi via leader election problems
